availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan A. Edwards. Father of Minerva Edwards, Joseph Edwards, Belinda Edwards, Daniel Edwards Cynthia Edwards, and John Edwards. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 233A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 320.
Find A Grave, "Jesse Edwards (1805-1888)," Memorial #76209470, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/76209470 (accessed March 19, 2020).
